attributes.action: Make Marijuana legal for recreational use
attributes.additional_details: I would like to make marijuana legal for recreational purposes as it has a calming effect and proven health uses. Much of the world is stressed out and going too fast for our good so I believe we should make Marijuana legal to help the world and get the world back at a good pace. Much of the worlds older population are closed off on the idea but much of the younger population are open too it as long as children can’t access it.
attributes.background: Make marijuana legal for growth and recreational use in the uk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
